entry.title: [GRA][MXPLAN] - Filerz16 incident notification
entry.content:
Sep 6, 08:25 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident has now been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

Start Time : 05/09/2024 22:55 UTC
End Time : 06/09/2024 05:53 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to a hardware issue.

Sep 5, 23:17 UTC
Identified - An incident is in progress on our public cloud offer.

Please be aware that this is currently affecting the availability.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 06/09/2024 22:55 UTC
Service impact : Mail service for Filerz16 is temporarily unavailable.
Root cause : Hardware issue.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue.
Update will be post as significant progress is made.

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [EU][Web Cloud] - Outlook Web Access mailbox migration
entry.content:
Sep 2, 07:42 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Aug 30, 18:41 UTC
Update - Please note the new end time for this maintenance :
End time : 02/09/2024 16:15 UTC

Apr 8, 16:10 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 28, 04:46 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Mar 28, 00:43 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Cloud offer.

Start time : 08/04/2024 16:10 UTC
End time : 30/08/2024 16:15 UTC
Service impact : Service interruption is expected for a few minutes to a few hours
Service improvement : The purpose of this operation is to migrate MXPLAN mailboxes under Outlook Web Access (OWA) to the new Zimbra Webmail.
No action is required from the customers.
For further information, please find attached a link to the FAQ: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/fr-mx-plan-zimbra-faq?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0061410

Thank you for your understanding.
